note:
Home on the range in NM, writer, star watcher, eclectic tastes. History, early music-I played recorder-geology, studied archaeology.Cats, dogs, horses, gardens, ancient Egypt, Hellenistic Astrology, Richard III.

Avatar is horse skull painted on profile of living chestnut horse. Banner is a green succulent with leaves that looks like a flower

fields.name: A hermit
fields.value: Living without TV or radio home on the range, I am in touch thru Masto.
